scripts.push: git push origin main && git push cdhubapi2 main
scripts.pub: git add . && git commit --allow-empty -m "version upgrade" && yarn patch && git commit --allow-empty -m "version upgrade of package.json" && git push
scripts.api-fetch: git fetch cd-hub-community && git checkout main && git merge -X theirs cd-hub-community/main && git push
scripts.backup: git add . && git commit -m 'backup' && git push
